JobFullDesc: Support the development and growth of the Multi- Vendor strategy in the Virtualization category in SoftwareONE for the generation and maturation of the pipeline by carrying out pre-sales engineering-oriented tasks . Focusing their efforts by 70% in the development of the segments Pipe Major , Enterprise, Corporate and Greenfield of manufacturers virtualization ( VMWare , Citrix, among others ) . TASKS ENGAGEMENT- Execution of webinars and various technical marketing activities- Development of presentations and engagement sessions with clients- Development of Workshops as marketing activities- Development of personalized workshops with client PRESALE TASKS- Information gathering in the pre-sale process- Use case design- Architecture design- Preparation of budgets and business sheets- Preparation of technical proposals TRAINING TASKS- Trace enablement plan in Virtualization manufacturers solutions through the OPEN portal- 3 Accreditations in the first Q- 2 Advanced Trainings from Virtualization manufacturers per Q- Constant update in workshops and laboratories of new available versions of Virtualization manufacturer solutions
